title: Bold Oval Hammered Ring
description: Edgy style that makes a major statement. Our Bold Oval Hammered Ring was made to make you stand out. Elevate any look with this textured ring, worn on it's own or with others, it's a fabulous addition to any jewelry collection.
details: Crafted in 18K gold vermeil, sterling silver layered with a thick layer of 18K gold, these are much higher quality than standard gold platingLength: 38MMWidth 18.8MMProduced in China
